comment: PLEASE DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!! This was by far the worst professor I've had in college so far and I'm an upcoming senior. Her tests are actually impossible to get a good grade on and they're all 50 questions with no curve. She doesn't know how to use D2L or any technology for that matter. Please if you care about your GPA don't take her.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: I had Rebecca Johnson for my online bio lab and it was lightwork. She was very kind and I learned a lot from this class. There wasn't much work!

She was super sweet! Always was open to helping. Some assignments were a bit confusing but having group assignments saved me in so much confusion. You will be stuck with one group for the whole semester so pick a good group!! The work wasn't super heavy it was relatively light compared to other courses I was taking.

Attendance matters. Will drop you a letter grade if you miss more than 2 unexcused absences during the semester. Lots of group work because of what the class is. She cares and will help if you don't get something. Easy GenEd class.
